Description: Six beads made in different materials and shapes. A: One elongated spherical bead, broken in half, made of glass. The broken surface is partly glazed green, accidentally? B: One smaller spherical bead made of white faience. C: Four disc-shaped beads, three made of ostrich eggshell, drilled from one side, one made of white faience.
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
